headline: 2 Healthcare Stocks Poised for a Comeback in 2026
summary: Don't wait too long to press the buy button on these comeback stories.

headline: Antibody Discovery Market to Hit USD 35.35 Billion by 2035, Driven by AI and Technology Innovations
summary: The global antibody discovery market, valued at USD 11.15 billion in 2025, is expected to surge to USD 35.35 billion by 2035, growing at a CAGR of 12.23%. This growth is fueled by advancements in engineering technologies, automation, and AI, benefiting the development of fully human and humanized antibodies, which enhance therapeutic attributes.
